title: Steampunk Game Sound Effects Library
description: Welcome to the sounds of time lost inventions, anachronistic widgets and mechanical contraptions.
longDescription:
Audio demo


Steampunk Game – Gadgets, Retro-tech and Mech Inventions Sound Effects Library is an authoritative collection of over 5000 meticulously crafted audio assets. Glued sound sets, one shot sound effects, loops, ambient backgrounds, organic source and designed sounds that capture just about every detail of the Steampunk retro-futuristic style. 

Designed for sound designers, editors and any creative audio person seeking to evoke the retro-tech, Victorian science fiction aesthetic of a steampunk world. This one of a kind sound effects library provides instant access to clinks clanks and clunks of cogs and gears, the whispers of steam valves, the rhythmic pulses of Victorian like machines, ambient backgrounds and mechanical environments, gadget loops and sounds of futuristic inventions.


  • Over 5000+ meticulously crafted game-ready audio assets
  • 900 sound sets
  • 9+ GB of audio in pristine 44k 16bit .wav format


A World of Sound Design at Your Command


Sound effects categories include, electrical charges, cool downs, mech, tools, energy, ability shimmers, orbs, collects, gadget, detach, pressure release, gas, steam, contraption levers, engines, trains, pulleys, wheels, fans, motors, machines, cranks, clanks, activations, UI / UX, upgrades, mechanisms, mechanical switches, destruct, hydraulics, rotating, static, radio, airship sails, industrial interlock, complex vault doors. Even more, the library features, circuit breaker, arc, spark, opens, closes, reloads, inserts, metals, impacts, city sewers, factory sounds, laboratory, train yard, construction, spins, designed whooshes, pickups, gears, combustion, wood antiques, latches, rollers, notifications / alerts, steampunk weapons, traps, melee sounds and explosions. Plus you get a host of steampunk sequences, loops and background sounds with a handful of music cues as a bonus.  


Maximum Possibilities in Steampunk Style


Explore an imaginative library that’s perfect for helping you create truly memorable sound designs and hyper-realistic atmospheres in genres and styles fitting of the steampunk style. Ideal for Victorian-era streets, industrial revolution workshops, airship battles, and mechanical marvels, this library is also suited for historical pieces, fantasy worlds, and games involving settlers coming to a new world. Steampunk Game – Gadgets, Retro-tech and Mech Inventions Sound Effects Library is a complete action-adventure sound library that comes with a massive collection of over 5064 SFX files.

Both the designed and source sections of the library are game-ready but versatile enough to further edit, mix, and match to your liking. Offering unparalleled creativity the library was developed to be a modular and useful sound bank, allowing you to create unique sonic aesthetics that will stand the test of time. Sound sets have various use cases. For example, the “Steam_Engine_Set” could be used for a steam-powered contraption, while the “Gadget_Collect” sound set could be an item pick-up, treasure grab, or positive reward.


UCS Compliant & Soundminer Metadata


All sound effects labeling is UCS compliant and is organized into categories to make it easier to navigate with understandable folder structures: Designed – Abilities, Actions, Weapons, Machines, Contraptions, Mechanisms, Pumps, System UI, System Notifications, Ambience Loops, Music Loops, Doors, Gadgets, Breakables, & more. On top of UCS, Steampunk Game – sound sets feature extensive metadata embedded in the files using Soundminer metadata to help you find the right sound at the right time as well.


A ready to go, vast and versatile sound bank. Whether you need the sound of a wood pulley lifting a sail or a mechanical contraption in action, this library has you covered. Get ready to bring your steampunk contraptions to life with Steampunk Game – Gadgets, Retro-tech and Mech Inventions Sound Effects Library.
